dcterms:creator: F. Yuan
X. He
A. Karatzoglou
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: ColdRec-1 includes both source and target domains. The source domain is the news recommendation dataset collected from QQ Browser. Each instance is formed of a sequence of watching interactions of a user, where the sequence length is set to 50. The target dataset is collected from Kandian, where all users are cold with at most 3 interactions.
dcterms:title: ColdRec-1

dcterms:creator: F. Yuan
X. He
A. Karatzoglou
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: ColdRec-2 has similar characteristics to ColdRec-1, except that the source dataset contains 100 watching interactions for each user in the sequence session. The target dataset has at most 5 interactions for each user.
dcterms:title: ColdRec-2

dcterms:creator: F. Yuan
X. He
A. Karatzoglou
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: ColdRec-3 is a private dataset collected by Tencent Oula team. The source domain is the news recommendation dataset of QQ Browser, and the session length is set to 50. The target domain is an advertisement recommendation dataset, where 90% of users in the target dataset have only one clicking action.
dcterms:title: ColdRec-3

dcterms:creator: F. Yuan
X. He
A. Karatzoglou
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: ColdRec-4 is collected from Tencent Video, including TV series, movies, and short videos. The session length is set to 50. The target dataset is collected from Kandian, where each user in the target dataset has at most 5 clicks on news and videos.
dcterms:title: ColdRec-4
